title: 2D Part. Motion with optimization part - c

content.question: Is there a time t at which the particle is farthest to the right? If yes, explain why and give the value of t and the x-coordinate of the position of the particle at that time. If no, explain why not.

frqParts.text: Is there a time t at which the particle is farthest to the right? If yes, explain why and give the value of t and the x-coordinate of the position of the particle at that time. If no, explain why not.

unit.text: 9: Parametric Equations, Polar Coordinates, and Vector-Valued Functions

topic.text: 9.6: (BC ONLY) Solving Motion Problems Using Parametric and Vector-Valued Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
